scripts.start:vite: concurrently "cd server && npm run server" "cd client && npm run dev:vite"
scripts.start:webpack: concurrently "cd server && npm run server" "cd client && npm run dev:webpack"
scripts.start: npm run build && cd server && node server.js
scripts.build:seed: cd server && npm run seed && cd ../client && npm run build
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
